i18n.key: • Signature for plugin {name} from {vendor} and of type {type} is not valid.

• >Signature for plugin {name} from {vendor} and of type {type} is valid.
  • This module has been signed with a certificate attributed to {subject} by {CN} with the following e-mail address {emailAddress}.
  • This certificate is valid between {validFrom} and {validTo}.
